messages.content: Comfy Visual Anagrams is a simple visual anagrams plugin for ComfyUI.
How can you install Comfy Visual Anagrams?
To install Comfy Visual Anagrams, go to the 'custom_nodes' directory in ComfyUI and run 'git clone https://github.com/zcfrank1st/comfyui_visual_anagrams.git'.
Is there an example image available for Comfy Visual Anagrams?
Yes, there is an example image named 'sample.png' that demonstrates the usage of Comfy Visual Anagrams.
What is the planned future improvement for Comfy Visual Anagrams?
The planned future improvement for Comfy Visual Anagrams is to add an animate node.
Who is the author of Comfy Visual Anagrams?
The author of Comfy Visual Anagrams is zcfrank1st, as seen in the GitHub repository URL.
In which directory should the Comfy Visual Anagrams plugin be installed?
The Comfy Visual Anagrams plugin should be installed in the 'custom_nodes' directory of ComfyUI.
Is Comfy Visual Anagrams an official ComfyUI plugin?
Comfy Visual Anagrams is not an official ComfyUI plugin; it is a third-party plugin created by zcfrank1st.
